SA15bsa069_u:17: abhinnaṃ cedvacanamapi nāstīti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatā kathamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:19: tato vacanaṃ nyāyyamiti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti kathaṃ bhavatocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:23: yathā gośṛṅge 'śvakarṇau vā parasparaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ na śaknuvataḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:34: tato 'smadvacanaṃ bhavataśca khaṇḍanamityetayoretat khaṇḍanametacca khaṇḍanīyamiti viśeṣo na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:50: yato yadi kumārī putravatīti na sampadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:59: yathā kaścinmanyeta śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyānupalabdhiratha śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyopalabdhiḥ pratyakṣasidveti,
SA15bsa069_u:92: iha loke yadā phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā sahetukaṃ jñātam /
SA15bsa069_u:97: yad bhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyahisaṃvāditvāditi tadidamidānīṃ bhavatā sārdhaṃ vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:103: yadi bhavadartho 'smaduktādanyastadānyatvadoṣo bhavata eva na tu mama /
SA15bsa069_u:119: yadyāvayorbheda eva na syānna tadā bhavatā vivādo 'haṃ tu bhavadarthameva vadāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:121: bhavatāpi kiñciduktamiti bhavānapyanyadvadatīti doṣo bhavata eva /
SA15bsa069_u:123: tarhi mamāpi vacanaṃ nānyaditi yad bhavatoktamahamanyadvadāmīti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:151: yadi bhavatocyate mama khaṇḍanamananubhāṣaṇameva tadā na mama matasyopalabdhi /
SA15bsa069_u:153: tato mama khaṇḍanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:157: tadā bhavān khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknoti /
SA15bsa069_u:158: kiṃ punarmanyate bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:167: na ca sa kālo vidyate yatra na khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam /
SA15bsa069_u:168: [ataḥ] yatra khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate sa kālo nāsti /
SA15bsa069_u:171: ananubhāṣya tu khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ ja śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:177: ananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti ced,
SA15bsa069_u:178: ananubhāṣyāpi tataḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa069_u:179: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanam nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:180: dvitīyamapi khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:181: dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyata iti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:182: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ [Tś_8] nāmāpyananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:186: tadā khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuaṃ śakyate natvananubhāṣya vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:196: yadā tvahaṃ bhavanmataṃ khaṇḍayāmi tadā bhavānapyanubhāṣate /
SA15bsa069_u:202: aparañca / sarve śabdā yadā mukhānnirgatāstadā naṣṭā eveti kathaṃ madvacanānubhāṣaṇam? /
SA15bsa069_u:209: tvadanubhāṣaṇāyaitanme vacanamiti yadbhavān bravīti sa kutarka eva /
SA15bsa069_u:220: kiñca yadyucyate bhavatā sarvāṇi vacanāni pūrvavartīni khaṇḍanantu paravartīti,
SA15bsa069_u:221: tadā bhavānapi pūrvameva vacanaṃ vadatīti paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:225: yacca khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvasya paravartīti svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścādasti /
SA15bsa069_u:226: yadi svabhāvata eva pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ paścāt syāt,
SA15bsa069_u:229: yadi svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścāt /
SA15bsa069_u:231: tadā pūrvasyāpi khaṇḍanaṃ parabhāvi na bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:241: yadi hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanādbhavato na nigrahasthānatvāpattistadā mamāpi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:250: api ca yadi sarvāṇi vacanāni hetvantarāṇi syustadābhavaduktāni vacanānyapi hetvantarāṇi bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:252: atha vacanānyuccārayannapi na bhavān nigrāhyastarhi yadbhavatoktaṃ hetuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayannahaṃ nigrāhya iti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:258: yadi matamasmadartho bhavadarthādananyastadāsmadartho bhavadarthapratipakṣatayā na virudvo /
SA15bsa069_u:266: aparañca yaduktaṃ sarvaṃ tadarthāntarañcettadā bhavaduktamapyarthāntaraṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:267: yadi bhavaduktamarthāntaraṃ na bhavettadā yadbhavatā pratijñātaṃ sarvamarthāntaramiti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:283: anyacca / yathā mayā pūrvamuktamanityaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:286: tataśca yadbhavatoktaṃ bhavān pūrvavacanaṃ vadatīti tanmithyā /
SA15bsa069_u:293: ktaṃ mayā sarvamuktaṃ nānujñāyata iti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ)
SA15bsa069_u:295: sarvaṃ nānujñāyata iti yaduktaṃ bhavatā etadvacanaṃ sarvasminnantarbhavati na vā? /
SA15bsa069_u:296: yadi tāvatsarvasminnantarbhavati tadā bhavān svayaṃ svoktaṃ nānujānāti /
SA15bsa069_u:297: yadi svayaṃ nānujānātyasmadarthaḥ svata eva siddho bhavedbhavavacanasya tu hāniḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:298: atha sarvasminnāntarbhavati tadā tasya sarvatvameva na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:311: yadi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ samyagarthena na saṃyuktaṃ syāttadā tadviparītakhaṇḍanamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:328: śabdo 'pi tatheti śabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:334: yannityaṃ na tatprayatnenotpannaṃ yathākāśaṃ nityaṃ na prayatnenotpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:340: yadyākāśasādharmyaṃ [Tś_13] tato nitya eva śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:349_0: prativādī tvanaikāntikaikarasārthapratyavasthānena khaṇḍanaṃ bhāṣate yathā yadi bhavān
SA15bsa069_u:349_1: sādharmyeṇa śabdasyānityatāṃ sthāpayati tadāhamapi vaidharmyeṇa śabdasya nityatāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:350: yadi ca bhavadarthaḥ siddho mamāpyarthaḥ siddho bhavediti /
SA15bsa069_u:359: yadi bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpito heturasmaddhetutulyobhavettadā samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:363: tadānityatāviparyāsadoṣo vyaktīkartuṃ na śakyata iti prasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:396: yo 'smābhiḥ sthāpito hetuḥ kṛtakatvācchabdo 'nitya iti tasya (hetoḥ)
SA15bsa069_u:399: yaḥ punarbhavatpratiṣṭhāpito hetuḥ śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāditi tasya pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartata ityasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:426: bhavaddhetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartate tasmādasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:430: yadatulyaṃ tulyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ viparītam /
SA15bsa069_u:437: prativādī prāha yadi sādharmyādyathā ghaṭādyanityaṃ śabdo 'pi tathā syāttadā sarvasya sarveṇāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:442: sadharmāṇyapi sarvāṇi vastūni viśeṣṭavastubhyo bhinnānīti cecchabdo 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:449: sarveṣāṃ na mayā sattvādisādharmyaṃ pratiṣidvamapi tu teṣāṃ viśeṣa evāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:451: taccāsmābhiranityatāsādhanāyocyate na tu sādharmyamātramupādīyate na khalvasti sā kāpi yuktiryā naivaṃ vicāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:453: naikamapi vidyate tādṛśaṃ yadanyavastuno na sadṛśaṃ na ca viśiṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:476: yadi siddhā pratijñopādīyate 'siddhastu heturbhavataḥ khaṇḍanasya viparyāso 'dhikataro bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:477: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ pūrvamabhūtvā paścādabhāva iti mayoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:480: yadi pūrvaṃ śabdaḥ sanneva na cāsti pratibandhastadā kasmācchrotreṇa nopalabhyate /
SA15bsa069_u:483: iṣṭasādhanaṃ ca na yuktisampannaṃ so 'rtho nirasanīyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:487: atha hetuḥ sādhyaṃ na prāpnoti tadāpyasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:490: yadi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti tadā sādhyena saṃsargātsādhyaṃ na sādhayati /
SA15bsa069_u:504: yadi bhavataḥ khaṇḍanamutpattihetusamāśritaṃ tadā siddhaṃ khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:507: uktaṃ mayā yaddhetuḥ sādhyaṃ notpādayatyapi tu parapratipādanārthaṃ sādhyaṃ vyanaktyavyāvṛttatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:512: yathā rūpasattve 'pi pradīpaprayojanaṃ tadvyañjanārthaṃ na tu tadutpattyartham /
SA15bsa069_u:518: yadi tāvaddhetuḥ prāk sādhyañca paścāttadāsati sādhye,
SA15bsa069_u:524: yathā yugapatsadbhāvāṅgoḥ śṛṅge dakṣiṇaṃ vāmaṃ vā parasparotpādake ityayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:528: yatpūrvaṃ samutpannaṃ [Tś_19] tadeva hetunā vyajyate yathā dīpaḥ vidyamānānyeva vastūni vyanakti na tvavidyamānāni vastūnyutpādayati /
SA15bsa069_u:529: bhavān punarutpattihetunā me vyañjakahetuṃ khaṇḍayati tasmādviparītametatkhaṇḍanaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:531: atha manyase yadyeṣa heturvyañjakaheturbhavati jñānābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:533: tadā prāptikriyāsambhave heturnāma nopapadyate kriyāsadbhāve tu heturnāmopapadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:535: taduktaṃ bhavati pūrvaṃ heturnāma nopapadyate paścāttu heturnāmopapadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:536: yaccābhihitaṃ hetuḥ prāk kriyā tu paścāditi tadadoṣam /
SA15bsa069_u:548: yadi prayatna[ānantarīyaka]tvācchabdo 'nityastadā yatra prayatno na vidyate tatra nityatāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:549: yathā vidyudvāyvādīnyaprayatna [ānantarīyaka]āṇyanityeṣu cāntarbhūtāni tasmādanityatve sādhye na prayatnamātraṃ samāśrayaṇīyaṃ prayatnasyāsādhanatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:550: sādhanañcedyatra yatra prayatno nāsti tatra tatra nityatāyāḥ sambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:560: yathā kasyacitpratijñā syāt sarve taravo divyacetanā iti /
SA15bsa069_u:566: śirīṣa eva svapiti na tvapare taravaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:567: sa svapno na sarvāṃstarūn vyāpnoti tasmātsarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ divyacetanatvapratiṣṭhāpane svapno 'samarthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:571: naitaducyate mayā yatprayatnaḥ sarvānityatākhyāpane samartho heturanye tu hetavo 'samarthāḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:584: yadyahaṃ bravīmi yadyadanityaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnasamutpannamiti tadā prayatnotpattihetoravyāpitvādasiddhatvamiti bhavatā khaṇḍanaṃ vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:586: yadāhaṃ bravīmi śabdābikamanityaṃ prayatnasamutpannatvāttadā yatsarvamanityaṃ [Tś_21] tatprayatnasamutpannamiti nocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:593: yatsamutpannaṃ tatprayatena vyaktaṃ yathā mūlakīlakodakaṃ prayatnena vyaktaṃ na tu prayatnena samutpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:598: kiṃ ghatavadasamutpannaḥ samutpadyate mūlakīlodakavatsamutpanno vā vyajyate?
SA15bsa069_u:606: api tu yataḥ prayatnena samutpannastasmācchabdo 'nitya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:626: yadi bhavato ghaṭadhvaṃsasya dhvaṃse sadbhāvastataḥ sadbhāvāddhvaṃsābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:645: yatprayatnenopalabhyate yacca prayatnena kriyate tadubhayaṃ bhinnamiti bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:651: yaccocyate yadabhivyaktaṃ nityamiti tasya kiṃ prayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:656: prayatna iti vacanaṃ śabdasyānityatāheturiti cettadā kiṃ prāpyate?
SA15bsa069_u:662: asmābhiḥ sthāpito heturabhivyaktyartho notpattyartho na vā vināśārthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:666: yadi vināśahetunā mām khaṇḍayati bhavān tadviparītakhaṇḍanaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:667: 10. kāryabhedakhaṇḍanam- kāryyabhedād ghaṭavatacchabda iti na vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:669: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi sthāpite prativādī prāha ghaṭaśabdayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:674: api tu sarvāṇi vastūni tulyena nyāyena kṛtakatvād anityānītyevamuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:725: yadi hetuṃ vinā [Tś_25] ghaṭasya nityatā sthāpitā śabdo 'pi nityetāhetumantareṇa nityo bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:748: meghe satyapi tu kadācidṛṣṭirbhavati kadācinna bhavatītyanaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa069_u:751: dhūme dṛṣṭe satyagniranumīyate dhūme tvasati agnerabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:774: asādharmyaṃ yacchabdaḥ śravaṇagrāhyo 'mūrtaśca ghaṭastu cakṣurgrāhyo mūrtaśca /
SA15bsa069_u:787: [Tś_27] yadi sato nityavaṃ siddhastadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sada khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:802: vastu sahetukañcet tadānityamiti jñeyaṃ ghaṭādivaditi sthāpite /
SA15bsa069_u:823: yadi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavādivyatiriktaṃ syāttadā pṛthaktvena grāhyaṃ draṣṭavyañca [Tś_28] sāmānyantu gavādivyatiriktaṃ pṛthaktvena gṛhyate na ca dṛśyate /
SA15bsa069_u:858: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ [Tś_29] kṛṣṇo bandhyāputraḥ śveta iti tadapi siddham bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:873: etatritayamaprayatna[ānantarīya] kaṃ bhavatā tvekena prakāreṇa nityamiti manyate /
SA15bsa069_u:885: yadi kaścidvadedandhakāre prabhāstīti tadvacanamapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:888: anityateti pṛthagdharmo 'nityena na sambaddhaḥ yo nityo mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:890: yadyanutpannaṃ vastūtpattiṃ labhata utpannantu vinaśyati tato 'nityamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:905: yadi hetuḥ pūrvaṃ pratijñā tu paścāt,
SA15bsa069_u:909: yadi bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ pūrvamasmatpratijñā tu paścādasmadarthābhāve kiṃ bhavatā khaṇḍyate /
SA15bsa069_u:910: yadyasmatpratijñā pūrvaṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāttadāsmatpratijñāyāṃ sthāpitāyāṃ kiṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanena /
SA15bsa069_u:913: mayā prakaṭitaṃ yadbhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavadarthameva pratiṣedhati na tu bhavatkhaṇḍanamavalambyāsmadartho pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:931: dvitīyo mūrdhā rūpagandhādimūrdhākārato na pṛthak mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:939: sa tu sanniti tadā dvitīyo mūrdhaviśeṣyo 'pi sanneva bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:940: dvitīyo mūrdhā sanniti bhavatā cenna pratipādyate tadātmanyapi tathā pratipattavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:944: tadāhamapi nyāyāsamaśrayātsanneva dvitīyo mūrdhā na tvātmeti cedvadeyameṣo 'rthaḥ sidvo bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:945: athāsmadartho na siddho bhavadartho 'pi na sidva ityucyate prasaṅgavyaktiḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:946: anyacca / ātmā dvitīya iva mūrdhāviśeṣyaḥ na tvasanniti cettadā vaiṣamyadoṣo bhavanmūrdhyāpatet /
SA15bsa069_u:947: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ sālaṅkāro bandhyāputro niralaṅkāra iti tadapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:952: nyāyāsamāśrayānniyatameva nāsti dvitīyo mūrdheti siddhaṃ ca tadvacanamiti tadā [Tś_32] mūrkhabālānyāyavacanānyapi sidhyeyuryathākāśo dṛśyaḥ,
SA15bsa069_u:954: grāhyoḥ vāyurityādi mūrkhavacanāninyāyāsamāśritānyapi bhavatsādhyavat siddhāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:992: śabda ākāśasādharmyannitya iti cettato yadi vaidharmyaṃ syāt,
SA15bsa069_u:997: sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā na mayā samālocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1005: vaidharmyaṃ tu sarvamanityaṃ nityavyatiriktamiti niścitaṃ vyanakti /
SA15bsa069_u:1016: asparśatvahetunā nityaḥ śabda iti bhavatā sthāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:1022: yadi heturasiddhastadā pratijñāpyasiddheti prasiddhamiti pratyavasthita idamāha /
SA15bsa069_u:1023: śabdo nityatā ceti na mama pratijñā /
SA15bsa069_u:1026: yo mayā nirdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sa rūpādiniṣedhārthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1030: śabdo nityatāyā na vyatiricyate śrotragrāhyādikāttu vyatiricyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1034: mayā na śabdo na ca nityatā sthāpyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1035: bhavān punaḥ śabdañca nityatāñca khaṇḍayati [Tś_35] na tu mama pratijñāṃ khaṇḍayati /
SA15bsa069_u:1044: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha bhavatoktaṃ sarvamanityaṃ tasmānnityaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:1062: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha nityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāditi bhavatoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:1067: tathā hi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavāderabhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ vā /
SA15bsa069_u:1071: gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśeta na tu gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśate tasmāddṛṣṭānto na nityatāsādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1073: [Tś_36] iti dūṣaṇe kṛte prativādī prāha kenaitatsthāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:1086: yathā vāyoḥ sparśasya ca sakṛdevābhivaktavāpi vāyuranityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1093: pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā śabdo nityo dviranabhivyaktatvādityadhunā tūcyate śabdo vāyuvilakṣaṇaḥ pṛthagindriyagrāhyatvāditi prathamahetutyāgena bhavata hetvantaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:1107: yadi kaściddharmaṃ vakti pariṣattu prativādī ca jijñāsāvapi trirabhihitaṃ jñātumasamarthau /
SA15bsa069_u:1109: aṇuramūrtaḥ sukhotpādakaḥ duḥkhotpādako 'prāpto sāpakarṣotkarṣaḥ samito 'sannyāso na vināśaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1116: daśavidhaṃ phalaṃ trividhaḥ kaṃbala ekavidhaṃ pānabhojanametadapārthakamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1120: yathā pārimāṇḍalyāśrayasya paramāṇornityatvātpārimāṇḍalyaṃ nityaṃ śabdasyāpi tathātvasambhava iti kṛte 'paraḥ prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:1126: atrāparaḥ / yathā gṛhe dagdhe tatparitrāṇāyodakānveṣaṇaṃ tathānavasare 'rtharakṣaṇāya hetusthāpanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1128: 11. nyūnam / pañcāvayavā anyatamena hīnā iti nyūnam /
SA15bsa069_u:1134: yadvastu kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtako 'nityaśceti tṛtīyo 'vayavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1147: atha sādhanasamarthastadā kiṃ hetubāhulyena udāharaṇabahulye 'pi tathātvasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1159: satyaṃ saṃsāro duḥkhaṃ satyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sukham /
SA15bsa069_u:1165: yadi na kiñcit prakaṭayitavyaṃ tadā tadaprayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1169: 15. ajñānam / pariṣadā vijñātāyā api pratijñāyāḥ kenacidavijñānamajñānamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1170: 16. apratibhā / yadi parasya pratijñāṃ nyāyavadīkṣate dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastadāpratibhā /
SA15bsa069_u:1174: yadi kaścidarthaṃ na vijānāti dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastena saha vādo na kartavya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:1181: 17. vikṣepaḥ / svapratijñāyā doṣaṃ jñātvā vyājaiḥ parihāraḥ kāryāntarakathanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1184: tadā tu yadi nāpakrāmati paradūṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ na kalpayati /
SA15bsa069_u:1196: tadarthe ca hīne kiṃ prayojanaṃ dūṣaṇena /
SA15bsa069_u:1205: pūrvaṃ caturvidhe siddhānte svayamaṅgīkṛte 'pi paścāccedyathāsiddhāntaṃ na brūyādayamapasiddhāntaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1217: yaḥ saśṛṅga sa gaurityanaikāntikaḥ chāgarurvādīnāṃ saśṛṅgatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:1225: yadi kenacideṣa hetuḥ prayujyate tadā hetvābhāsanigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
